ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Dumb newbie question
ygData.msgSnippet: You re pretty much right. A weapon like a Polished Granite Tomahawk that has a proc, activates by itself randomly as you fight. Other items that have an
ygData.messageBody:
You're pretty much right.

A weapon like a Polished Granite Tomahawk that has a proc, activates by
itself randomly as you fight.

Other items that have an effect, like Mask of Deception, need to be
activated by "right-clicking" on them (make sure you aren't singing any
songs or it won't activate).

Windleaf Mistsong
Level 32 balladeer
Clan Battlehammer
Bertox

At 02:01 PM 5/18/00 -0400, you wrote:
>Since I've only very recently acquired my first proc'ing ANYTHING, could
>someone please tell me how they work? I had assumed the weapons would proc
>on their own just by fighting with them. How do you get a pair of pants to
>proc? I'd hate to think clothing that procs Gate would go off randomly from
>wearing it. Right-click the stuff or something?
>
>Confused,
>Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
